name: project_charter_lite
description: Streamlined project charter for focused, time-bound initiatives

task_and_purpose.task: Document the goal, scope, deliverables, and timeline for a focused project initiative
task_and_purpose.purpose: Align stakeholders on what will be delivered, why it matters, and when it will be complete

inputs.label: Project Title
inputs.description: Clear, concise name for your project
inputs.placeholder: e.g., Monthly Productivity Pulses, Q4 Partnership Review

inputs.label: Project Goal
inputs.description: What are you trying to accomplish?
inputs.placeholder: Generate concise, data-driven monthly productivity highlight emails for facility partners...

inputs.label: Success Criteria
inputs.description: How will you know this project succeeded?
inputs.placeholder:
- Emails are exactly 3 paragraphs
- All metrics sourced from JSON data
- Neutral, partnership-focused tone
- Partners take staffing actions based on insights

inputs.label: Key Deliverables
inputs.placeholder:
- Email subject line
- 3-paragraph email body
- Chart descriptions
- Lessons learned after each send

inputs.label: Scope (In / Out)
inputs.placeholder:
In: monthly email generation, JSON parsing, chart references
Out: automated chart generation, facility rankings, unrelated metrics

inputs.label: Timeline & Milestones
inputs.description: When will this happen? Key dates?
inputs.placeholder:
- Generate by 30th of each month
- Stakeholder review within 48 hours
- Send to partners by 3rd business day

inputs.label: High-Level Requirements
inputs.description: What capabilities or resources are needed?
inputs.placeholder:
- Accept JSON service-line data
- Enforce 3-paragraph output
- Ensure apples-to-apples comparisons
- Support chart descriptions

inputs.label: Risks & Assumptions
inputs.description: What could go wrong? What are you assuming?
inputs.placeholder:
Assumptions: consistent JSON format; partners prefer neutral language
Risks: data quality issues; misinterpretation without proper framing

sections.title: Project Goal
sections.description: What you're trying to accomplish and success measures

verification_questions.question: Is the project goal clear and achievable?
verification_questions.remediation_hint: Goal should be specific and measurable, not vague.

verification_questions.question: Do the success criteria clearly define what 'done' looks like?
verification_questions.remediation_hint: Add measurable outcomes that stakeholders can verify.

verification_questions.question: Are the deliverables specific and actionable?
verification_questions.remediation_hint: List concrete outputs, not abstract concepts.

rubric.description: Quality criteria for lightweight project charters

criteria.name: clarity
criteria.description: Goal and success criteria are clear and unambiguous

criteria.name: completeness
criteria.description: All essential elements present (goal, deliverables, scope, timeline)

criteria.name: feasibility
criteria.description: Timeline and requirements are realistic and achievable
